title: Manger Babies
description: Once upon a time, almost 2,000s of years ago our lord and savior, Jesus Christ, was born in a manger. And in that manger, there were the cutest little animals. This is their story.
quote: God is the designated driver tonight.
altHero: Luanne Platter, a blonde woman, with donkey and cat puppets on her hands

alt4: Luanne with her puppets next to Hank Hill in a white flowy beard
